title: can i make my leaverbuster time ban recede from 10 minutes to 5 minutes to 0 again?
body: I had to leave a few games and was put into a low priority queue. Once it had passed and i had no ban time, i left another game (for valid reason) and the ban went from 5 minutes to 10 minutes. What can i do to "redeem" my activity and make it so i only get a warning if i leave a game?

replies.body: A few and then another? Sounds like you need to play games with a pause/save feature.

after a while of playing games and NOT leaving, you'll receive notifications that your behavior has improved blah blah and that means your ban time will decrease. i can't tell you exactly how many games it is but it's quite a lot.
